project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a CSV file and parse its contents
Implement functionality to calculate the mean of specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the median of specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the mode of specified numerical columns
Develop the user interface to accept user input for CSV file and numerical columns
Write tests for each of the implemented functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
